item.title: EP 453 - "I Wish I Never Said The Name Of The Star . . ."
item.itunes:title: "I Wish I Never Said The Name Of The Star . . ."
item.description:
Today it’s all cars, baby! First off, a man is telepathically assaulted by an abandoned car, then a man is seen putting his own son in the trunk of a car, and finally we take an Uber driven by a demonically possessed man!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

SPECIAL MUSICAL GUEST SUNDIVER!

“205” by Sundiver

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2I-bmc1mR4c

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Links:

 

Arnold man allegedly punctures tire on car, claiming it made sexual advances toward him

https://www.myleaderpaper.com/news/police_fire/arnold-man-allegedly-punctures-tire-on-car-claiming-it-made-sexual-advances-toward-him/article_342c06e2-8a72-11ea-8669-87be79cf75f8.html

 

A Hidden Camera and a Child in the Trunk: A Couple’s Social Experiment Leads to Criminal Charges

https://www.nbcchicago.com/local/a-hidden-camera-and-a-child-in-the-trunk-a-couples-social/153700/

 

'We did this for a good purpose:' Dad arrested in Norridge for placing son in car trunk defends 'experiment'

https://www.chicagotribune.com/suburbs/norridge/ct-nhh-child-endanger-charge-update-tl-0927-story.html

 

Father arrested for putting 3-year-old in trunk says he was conducting social experiment

https://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/father-arrested-putting-3-year-old-trunk-says-he-was-n913416

 

Accused mass shooter says he was possessed by Uber app

https://www.mlive.com/news/kalamazoo/2016/03/accused_mass_shooter_says_he_w.html

 

2016 Kalamazoo shootings

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/2016_Kalamazoo_shootings

 

How Uber shooter Jason Dalton's guilty plea stopped his murder trial

https://www.mlive.com/news/g66l-2019/01/ae7b0aa36e7790/how-uber-shooter-jason-daltons.html

 

Kalamazoo Shooter Jason Dalton Sentenced To Life In Prison

https://www.wmuk.org/post/kalamazoo-shooter-jason-dalton-sentenced-life-prison

 

Order of the Eastern Star

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Order_of_the_Eastern_Star

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Dead Rabbit Skull By John from the SCAR Group

 

Dead Rabbit Exposed By Smashers_25 (Instagram)

 

Halloween Monster By Finn

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Reptilian Strip Song EP 374: “Empty Beds”

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
